n: Orange Wild Rice with Pistachios and Cranberries
des: "Dried cranberries and pistachios are added to wild rice that has a mild orange flavor to yield a hearty and easy side or main dish."
ins: Combine orange juice, rice, and water in a saucepan; bring to a boil, reduce heat to low, cover saucepan with a lid, and simmer until rice is tender, about 45 minutes. Remove from heat and let steam, covered, for 10 minutes more. Stir pistachios and cranberries into rice.
